events.comment: On Mac there is a delay between the playing the music on the channel and the "is being played" condition returning true. To work around this, we don't leave the State "playing" unless PlayState is also "playing". So PlayState goes: stopped -> requested -> playing -> stopped

events.name: Gotta enumerate every track because the "Play music" action requires a file

events.comment: This kicks off the PlayState to indicate the loading has finished.
If the music is to switch, then fade out the current track

eventsFunctions.description: Whether a track is queued. If "" is passed as the track, just whether anything is queued.
eventsFunctions.name: IsQueued

eventsFunctions.description: Whether a track is playing. If "" is passed as the track, just whether anything is playing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPlaying
